name: playwright_multi_browser_basics
description: Launch and control Chromium, Firefox, and WebKit browsers

args: const { chromium } = require('playwright'); (async () => { const browser = await chromium.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); console.log('Chromium - Title:', await page.title()); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Chromium - Title: Example Domain

Chromium browser tested

args: const { firefox } = require('playwright'); (async () => { const browser = await firefox.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); console.log('Firefox - Title:', await page.title()); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Firefox - Title: Example Domain

Firefox browser tested

args: const { webkit } = require('playwright'); (async () => { const browser = await webkit.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); console.log('WebKit - Title:', await page.title()); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
WebKit - Title: Example Domain

WebKit (Safari) browser tested
